Key Match Events: The Spurs were able to steal a win in Denver with a 113-110 final score, as San Antonio bounced back from a weak third quarter to secure a pivotal win.
Jokic and Wembanyama ended the game as the top two performers, making NBA history in the process.
Post-Match Reflections: After the game, Jokic has high praise for the young Spurs phenom, stating, 'I think he's better this year than last year and I think he's gonna get even better. I think he's a special player, one of a kind, [and] will be remembered forever.'
